meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or resembling a utricle.
meanings.sent1: The utricular sensation was gentle and calming.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the utricular structure carefully.
meanings.sent3: The utricular design of the room made it feel cozy and inviting.

meanings.sent3: The utricular placement of the chair seemed odd but functional.
